column1: When Lotho Sackville-Baggins took control of the Shire and expanded the Watch
column2: the Shirriffs used crude buildings as Shirriff-houses.

column1: At the west end of Frogmorton was a poorly constructed one-story brick building with narrow windows
column2: which served as the barracks of the First Eastfarthing Troop.
